summary.p1: Hi, glad you stopped by :) I’m a frontend developer with over 3 years of experience working with React and TypeScript. I create user-friendly, fast, and modern interfaces, paying attention to detail and code quality.
summary.p2: I’m passionate about my profession, adapt quickly to new tasks and technologies, and easily connect with both team members and clients. I value openness and results.

contacts.title: Let’s stay in touch!
contacts.description: If you have any questions, ideas, or exciting projects — feel free to reach out. I’m always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
